overview: Jeremy is an interactive industry veteran who has worked on several showcase projects for companies including but not limited to Microsoft, Adobe, FOX, Intuit, and more. He has an extensive background in all aspects of software development projects: working as a programmer, project manager, and consultant. His skill set includes WPF and WPF/E tools, XAML and C#, .NET, SQL, PHP, SharePoint integration and anything else necessary to deliver cutting edge solutions. Jeremy is also a certified coach focused on team building and individual development and coaching services specializing in high-tech companies.
